publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-117 Malcolm Chisholm: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (Scotland) Order 2003 â€”That the Health Committee, in consideration of the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (Scotland) Order (SSI 2003/260), recommends that the order be approved. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe*
